item.description:
This month we are celebrating Denny's birthday!

Each third Saturday, we host a "Locavore" potluck at our home at 254 Cider Hill Rd., York, ME, from 3 pm until weâ€™re tired of laughing and talking. All are welcome. Whether you choose an omnivorous, vegetarian, or raw vegan diet; Northern New England is a wonderful place to eat locally. Please join us as we celebrate our local bounty at our monthly "Locavore" potluck. Bring a favorite dish prepared with local, preferably organic, ingredients. Please write down all ingredients for those of us with allergies and/or ethical persuasions. Be prepared to have the best time ever!

We hope you can join us for all of these amazing events. And don't forget to visit us online at www.aimeeslivinmagic.com.

All our love,
Aimee and Denny Perrin
Aimee's Livin' Magic
254 Cider Hill Road
York, ME 03909
www.aimeeslivinmagic.com

Note: There will be a large assortment of packaged Aimee's Livin' Magic raw vegan foods available for purchase. Aimee and Denny have expanded their potluck to include "Locavore" food which includes locally grown produce and possibly raw honey, dairy, etc? It is advised to check the ingredient list or ask for the ingredients of the dishes at the potluck depending on your and/or your guests' needs.
item.how_to_find_us: Please contact other members to meet and carpool. Enjoy!
item.name: Potluck: York, ME (3rd_Sat.)
